SEARCH
Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.observers

Interface ModelObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
AvailableGamesObserver, ClientStateObserver, DeckObserver, GameFieldObserver, HandObserver, ObjectivesObserver, PlayerObserver, ScoreBoardObserver, SelectableCardsObserver
public interface ModelObserver
This interface should be implemented by any class that wants to be notified of changes in the model it observes. This interface follows the Observer design pattern, where the observer will be updated when there is a change in the observable model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    update()
    This method is called when the observed model is updated.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update()
      This method is called when the observed model is updated. Implementing classes should define the specific behavior that should occur when the model changes.
